result.arabic_text: فَٱسۡتَجَبۡنَا لَهُۥ فَكَشَفۡنَا مَا بِهِۦ مِن ضُرّٖۖ وَءَاتَيۡنَٰهُ أَهۡلَهُۥ وَمِثۡلَهُم مَّعَهُمۡ رَحۡمَةٗ مِّنۡ عِندِنَا وَذِكۡرَىٰ لِلۡعَٰبِدِينَ
result.translation: Nuko twakira ugutakamba kwe, maze tumukiza uburwayi yari afite, tunamugarurira umuryango we (umugore n’abana ndetse n’umutungo yari yaratakaje), tumwongereraho n’ibindi nka byo. (Ibyo twabikoze) ari impuhwe ziduturutseho (bikaba) n’urwibutso ku bagaragira Allah.
